attributes.action:
Worried about Migrant Crisis/  Immigration and EU?
 sign the petition.
attributes.background: A group of us have decided we need to voice our concerns and worries regarding the Immigration Crisis which this summer has shown us they have now organised themselves." Bring in the Army" and stop being soft on France Mr Cameron and Teresa May.

rejection.details:
We would be able to accept a petition on this topic, if it was clear about what you wanted Parliament or the Government to do. For example, it would be helpful if you explained what you would like the Government to ask the army to do, or if you explained what action you would like the UK Government to take towards the French Government.

If you search the petitions that are already open, you may find that there is already one asking for the action you would like to see.
